statements: DELETE FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE guide_name = 'John Smith'
DELETE FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE tour_id = 1 AND guide_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM guided_rock_climbing_tours WHERE location = 'Mountain Top' AND max_participants < 10;
DELETE FROM TourAvailability WHERE tour_id = 100 AND tour_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM guided_tours WHERE tour_name = 'Discovery Tour';
DELETE FROM tour_participants WHERE participant_id IN (SELECT participant_id FROM tour_feedback WHERE rating < 3);
DELETE FROM guides WHERE guide_name = 'John Doe';
